amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 1149, in lieu of the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Foreign Affairs, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 118-29 is considered adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment considered as adopted: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
